Function reference

All functions

as_synoptReg()
Convert a SpatRaster object to a data.frame structure required by synoptReg
ct2env()
Establishing the relationship between CT and a environmental variable
download_ncep()
Download NCEP/NCAR data
get_lamb_points()
Determine the 16 grid points for the Lamb classification
lamb_clas()
Objective Lamb Weather Type Classification
msl
Mean Sea Level pressure data
mslp
Mean Sea Level pressure data
pca_decision()
PCA decision
pcp
Daily precipitation grid of Balearic Islands (Spain)
plot_lamb_scheme()
Plot Lamb Scheme
raster_pca()
Raster PCA
read_nc()
Read and tidy your NetCDF
regionalization()
Environmental regionalization
som_clas()
Self-Organizing Maps classification
spatial_lamb()
Spatial objective Lamb Weather Type Classification
synoptclas()
PCA Synoptic classification
tidy_nc()
Set the time period and the geogprahical extension, as well as computes the anomaly of the atmospheric variable/s
z500
500 hPa Geopotential Height
